formula: Dirichlet g.f.: zeta(s) * zeta(s-1) * zeta(s-3). - Corrected by _Álvar Ibeas_, Jan 31 2015Multiplicative with a(p^e) = (p^(3e+5) - (p^2+p+1)*p^(e+1) + p + 1) / ((p^3-1)*(p^2-1)). - _Mitch Harris_, Jun 27 2005
mathematica: a[n_] := DivisorSum[n, DivisorSigma[1, n/#]*#^3&]; Array[a, 45] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 07 2015 *)
prog: (PARI) N=66; x='x+O('x^N);c=sum(j=1,N,j*x^j);t=log(1/prod(j=1,N, eta(x^(j))^(j^2)));Vec(serconvol(t,c)) \\ _Joerg Arndt_, May 03 2008(PARI) a(n) = sumdiv(n, d, sigma(n/d)*d^3); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 24 2015
crossrefs: Cf. A001001 (Dirichlet convolution of sigma and n^2).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
